title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 15 2021
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H1 – Jul 15 2021
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1: The unfolding situation in Cuba. White House refuses to condemn communism! Leftists blame the United States for the protests in Cuba. BLM defends the brutal, oppressive Cuban regime. In a standard move by totalitarian dictatorships, Cuba has shut down internet access to the public. Cuban-American callers share their thoughts on socialism and the Cuban freedom fighters. In a propaganda win for China, Secretary of State Blinken invites U.N. racism investigators to visit U.S.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
